sentences.en: A frightful traffic disaster was avoided.
sentences.cn: 一次可怕的交通事故避免了.

sentences.en: Came frightful days of snow and rain.
sentences.cn: 接着下了几天可怕的雨雪.

sentences.en: Ellen froze with terror at the frightful sight.
sentences.cn: 埃伦被这种恐怖场面吓得发抖.

sentences.en: He looked pale and his clothes were in a frightful state.
sentences.cn: 他看上去脸色苍白,一身衣服弄得一塌糊涂.
他讲的是蹩脚的西班牙语.

sentences.en: I was awakened by a frightful clap of thunder.
sentences.cn: 我被一声可怕的雷声惊醒.

sentences.en: It was with the greatest difficulty that the boy gathered the strength to speak, but spoke with a frightful emphasis.
sentences.cn: 那个男孩艰难地、费了很大力气说出话来, 然而他吐字有力,使人惊惧.

sentences.en: Look at the influence that man must have. Is it not frightful?
sentences.cn: 从这里可以看出,此人的来头非同小可. 不是有点可怕 吗 ?

sentences.en: St. Clare is really frightful - he frightens me - good - natured as he looks in general.
sentences.cn: 表面上看来,圣·克莱亚的脾气一般还不错,但实际上却非常可怕,简直使我心惊肉跳.

sentences.en: The cats set up a frightful yowling when the dog appeared.
sentences.cn: 猫看到那条狗就都大声叫起来.

sentences.en: The spectators startled, as he turned upon her with a frightful suddenness.
sentences.cn: 旁观者惊动了, 因为他以一种骇人的突然猛抱住了她.
发生了一起可怕的意外。

sentences.en: What frightful gossips people are, even one'sbest friends.
sentences.cn: 人们最爱散布流言蜚语，哪怕是自己最好的朋友也不例外。
